platform.summary: Align complete assemblies of SARS-CoV-2 genomes wih the reference genomic sequence, to obtain a list of polymorphic positions and to annotate genetic variants.
comments: CorGAT runs on the [Laniakea](/src/use/laniakea/index.md) research cloud.
quotas: Supports anonymous logins and user account creation.
citations: Chiara, M., Zambelli, F., Tangaro, M. A., Mandreoli, P., Horner, D. S., & Pesole, G. (2020). [CorGAT: A tool for the functional annotation of SARS-CoV-2 genomes](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa1047). *Bioinformatics*, btaa1047. DOI: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa1047
sponsors: [Department of Biosciences](http://eng.dbs.unimi.it/ecm/home), University of Milan, Milan, Italy
[Institute of Biomembranes, Bioenergetics and Molecular Biotechnologies](http://www.ibiom.cnr.it/en/), National Research Council, Bari, Italy
